text: This is a list of Brazilian television related events from 1974. ==Events== ==Debuts== ==Television shows== ===1970s=== *Vila Sésamo (1972-1977, 2007–present) ==Births== *6 July - Babi Xavier, actress, singer & TV host *8 August - Preta Gil, singer & actress *17 October - Bárbara Paz, actress & model ==Deaths== ==See also== *1974 in Brazil
title: 1974 in Brazilian television
